info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:29PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cochise and southeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 215 PM MST... At 129 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parker Canyon Lake, or 13 miles southwest of Sierra Vista, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parker Canyon Lake, Fort Huachuca, Lochiel and Canelo. This includes Route 83 between mile markers 3 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
